title: O5-9 (Misfortune)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Upon death, you will swap places with a random player. You will take on their role and goal. They will take your role, but lose this attribute. Neither of you die (unless someone dies via other means. This swap is presumed to take place before other attacks.)
- If the player you swapped with dies before you, regain your original role and goal without the first attribute.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Recontain all anomalies and eliminate all opposing forces.

desc:
Post 4530
*"When O5-9 is killed — and he has been killed several times — he is "reset"."*
